string.description: resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash

list.description: list of fields to be exported from the configured EDB table.

string.description: The EDB path to export, in the format '.namespace.node.srl.interface'
Export Period. A 1s minimum is enforced.

A topic name to which the producer must write
updates from this export path
A where clause to use for the query, e.g. 'oper-state = down'. You can omit enclosing parentheses.

list_nested.description: Exports is the list of paths to be exported as well as the topic and mode for each.

int64.description: The total number of times to retry sending a message

string.description: Number of replica acknowledgements the broker must see before responding
token url for OAUTHBEARER SASL mechanism

single_nested.description: Kafka SASL configuration
Kafka TLS configuration
ClusterProducerSpec defines the desired state of ClusterProducer
ClusterProducerStatus defines the observed state of ClusterProducer

string.description: a comma-separated list of resource fields to fetch/return.  If unspecified, all fields are fetched.  If empty, only key-fields are fetched.
an EQL "where" expression that will be used to filter the set of resources returned.
a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
